tool_description: Anagram solver akin to the word game in Channel 4's Countdown
name: Countdown
title: Countdown

api_list.name: /solve/{anagram}
api_list.description: Returns an array of the best possible solutions

optional_parameters.name: variance
optional_parameters.description: Variance in the length of the possible solutions e.g. if the best solution has 7 characters and we have a variance of 2, the array will also include solutions of 5 and 6 characters. A variance of -1 will include all possible solutions. 0 will return only the best solutions
